remarks: The predicate "is a lattice plane".  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2012.)
statement:
lplnset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lplnset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lplnset.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
lplnset.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
islpln4 $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ X e. B ) -> ( X e. P <-> E. y e. N y C X ) ) $.
$d K y $.
$d N y $.
$d X y $.
